messages.title: Climate Crisis
messages.content: HOW YOU CAN HELP STOP CLIMATE CHANGE AND PROTECT OUR ENVIRONMENT. Find out more at: https://www.sas.org.uk/

messages.title: Stop Brexit?
messages.content: BREXIT will lead to: Loss of workers rights such as parental leave and holiday pay. Loss of investment in British industry. Break up of the United Kingdom. End of the Good Friday Agreement. Devastation of sheep and beef farming and their communities. Threat to our national security. Years of continuing chaos.

messages.title: Three reasons to vote Liberal Democrats
messages.content: Liberal Democrats have maintained a consistent policy to stay in the European Union in the interests of the United Kingdom. Liberal Democrats are a party of the centre, opposed to the extreme positions of Labour and Conservative parties. Liberal Democrats will protect the environment in the face of the Climate Crisis.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Achieve net zero greenhouse emissions by 2045 at the latest. Accelerate the development of renewable power, reaching at least 80% of electricity generation by 2030. Integrate climate objectives into the heart of national and local government, establish Citizens’ Climate Assemblies and set up a Just Transition Commission to ensure no one loses out.
The Liberal Democrats have maintained a consistent policy to stay in the European Union in the interests of the United Kingdom.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Julian Smith, Boris Johnson, Jeremy Corbyn
mentions.tacticalSituation: In Skipton and Ripon only the Liberal Democrats can beat the Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit? BREXIT will lead to: Loss of workers rights such as parental leave and holiday pay. Loss of investment in British industry. Break up of the United Kingdom. End of the Good Friday Agreement. Devastation of sheep and beef farming and their communities. Threat to our national security. Years of continuing chaos.
issues.environment: Climate Crisis: Achieve net zero greenhouse emissions by 2045 at the latest. Accelerate the development of renewable power, reaching at least 80% of electricity generation by 2030. Integrate climate objectives into the heart of national and local government, establish Citizens’ Climate Assemblies and set up a Just Transition Commission to ensure no one loses out.

leaflet.personalStatement: Andrew, an NHS cardiac surgeon by profession, now runs a smallholding near Glasshouses in Nidderdale. He is a councillor in Beverley and is widely involved in the local community in Nidderdale. He says: 'The Liberal Democrat philosophy of tolerance, individual freedom and fairness and our policies on education, the environment and the economy will be instrumental in restoring public confidence in the political process when the dust of Brexit finally settles.'

politicalExperience.role: NHS cardiac surgeon, Councillor in Beverley
